attributes.action: Free transport for all school age children
attributes.additional_details: In trying times parents are struggling to get there children to and from school as the cost is extortionate, children are only eligible for free transport if the are accepted to their nearest school and its over 3 miles away. Every child should have the right to free school transport
attributes.background: Provide free school transport for all school age children

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617780
